formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'WaitForRing' =-
[Synopsis] Wait for Ring Application
[Description] WaitForRing(timeout) Returns 0 after waiting at least timeout seconds. and only after the next ring has completed. Returns 0 on success or -1 on hangup

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ Wait for Ring Application
[Description] - WaitForRing(timeout) + WaitForRing(timeout): Returns 0 after waiting at least timeout seconds. and only after the next ring has completed. Returns 0 on success or -1 on hangup
